name: Gallant's Adventure
description:
Gallant's Adventure

This is a platform game that didn't go as plan and was constantly evolving!

We stayed up all night till 2AM (South African Time) in excitement for the theme, when we found out the theme is "Everything is Broken" we instantly knew we wanted it to be based off of the Greek ruins - following a path of destruction between the Gods and the Titans. 

Our player Gallant wakes up hundreds of years after the war and starts exploring the ruins only to find Cthulhu still roaming the base of mount Olympus.

Unfortunately  we weren't able to finish the enemies or boss battle in time but we really enjoyed this GameJam!

Still to be continued!

System: Unity
Kian Degenaar - Reuben Janse van Rensburg
